name: SummerTime CleanUp
description:
Play as an unemployed janitor as you clean up a five-star tropical island called Paradisio. Collect three pearls and spray any gunk that comes your way, before the vacationers come. 

Team:
Abu Bangurah: Main lead, Programmer, Game Designer

reals10 and Joshlynn: Assistant Programmers

mit-mit: Composer;

JaiRaj47: Level Designer


Controls:

WASD: To move

Left Mouse Key: To shoot out water

Mouse: To look around
